conversations.body_text: Hello，Jan Šustr，   we sincerely apologize for the delay. The items you ordered are currently out of stock, and we are urgently restocking them. We will ship your order as soon as the items are back in stock.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and thank you for your patience.

Hi Jan Šustr,  We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused by the logistics delay. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock, with restocking expected to be completed by the 29th. At that time, we will ship your order via DHL and refund the additional shipping fees.
